refnamediv.refpurpose: Mutator to control changes to a boolean variable

listitem.para: (Output argument) Error code value : zero indicates that no errors occurred
MASCARET instance number returned by the function MASCARET_create
Name of the variable (dot notation), the list of all the possible variables is returned by MASCARET_getDescVar
New boolean value (integer value indeed : 1 ->TRUE, 0 ->FALSE) of a variable with the specific indices

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Mutator to control changes to a boolean variable of the model or of the state
